    Fit a topic model by ASAP

    fit.topic.asap.Rd

    Fit a topic model by ASAP

    fit.topic.asap(
  mtx.file,
  k,
  pb.factors = 10,
  num.proj = 1,
  em.step = 100,
  max.pb.size = 1000,
  .burnin = 0,
  .reg.steps = 10,
  .reg.stdize = TRUE,
  .scale.cols = FALSE,
  a0 = 1,
  b0 = 1,
  index.file = paste0(mtx.file, ".index"),
  verbose = TRUE,
  num.threads = 1,
  block.size = 100,
  .rand.seed = 42,
  .eps = 1e-06,
  svd.init = FALSE,
  do.log1p = FALSE,
  covar = NULL,
  batch = NULL
)

    Arguments

    mtx.file

    data matrix file in a matrix market format

    k

    number of topics

    num.proj

    the number of pseudobulk projection steps (default: 1)

    em.step

    Monte Carlo EM steps (default: 100)

    max.pb.size

    maximum pseudobulk size (default: 1000)

    .burnin

    burn-in period in the record keeping (default: 0)

    .reg.steps

    number of steps in regression analysis (default: 10)

    .reg.stdize

    standardize X in regression (default: TRUE)

    a0

    Gamma(a0, b0) prior (default: 1)

    b0

    Gamma(a0, b0) prior (default: 1)

    index.file

    a file for column indexes (default: "mtx.file.index")

    verbose

    verbosity

    num.threads

    number of threads (default: 1)

    block.size

    a block size for disk I/O (default: 100)

    .rand.seed

    random seed (default: 42)

    svd.init

    (default: FALSE)

    do.log1p

    (default: FALSE)

    covar

    sample x var covariate matrix (default: NULL)

    batch

    batch information for each sample (default: NULL)

    .stdize.cols

    standardize columns after log (default: TRUE)

    eval.llik

    evaluate log-likelihood trace in PMF (default: TRUE)

    Value

    a list that contains:

    • beta.rescaled rescaled dictionary (feature x factor)

    • theta.rescaled rescaled loading (sample x factor)

    • beta dictionary (feature x factor)

    • log.beta log-dictionary (feature x factor)

    • theta loading (sample x factor)

    • log.theta log-loading (sample x factor)

    • Y pseudobulk (PB) data (feature x pseudobulk samples)

    • nmf non-negative matrix factorization results

      • log.likelihood log-likelihood trace

      • beta dictionary of PB data

      • log.beta log dictionary of PB data

      • theta factor loadings of PB data

      • log.theta log factor loadings of PB data

      • log.phi auxiliary variable (feature x factor)

      • log.rho auxiliary variable (sample x factor)

      • beta.rescaled rescaled dictionary

      • theta.rescaled rescaled factor loading

      • depth

    • corr sample x factor correlation matrix

    Contents
